name: data-card-02
effect: Records the number of times the trainer has come in last place overall in the Pokéathlon.
short_effect: Records the number of times the trainer has come in last place overall in the Pokéathlon.

flavor_text.sun-moon: It holds Pokéathlon records. It is a card that shows how many losses you have had in the Pokéathlon.
flavor_text.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: It holds Pokéathlon records. It is a card that shows how many losses you have had in the Pokéathlon.
flavor_text.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: It holds Pokéathlon records. It is a card that shows how many losses you have had in the Pokéathlon.
